item.title: AAPL
item.description: score:-34 Chances: Apple’s recent rally and resilience in the market despite warnings. Apple’s support for California’s ‘Right to Repair’ bill could enhance its image. Importance of Apple’s Services segment highlighted as a crucial factor. Nvidia’s success and market value growth compared to Apple’s.
